ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Your provision is in heaven - and what you are promised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: There is in the heavens your sustenance, and whatever has been promised you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And in heaven is your provision and also what you are being promised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: In the heavens there is your sustenance and that which you were promised (Paradise).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And in the heaven lies your sustenance, and the promise you are given.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And in the heaven is your provision, and that which you are promised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And in the heaven is your sustenance and what you are threatened with.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And in heaven is your provision, and that you are promised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And in the heaven is your providence and that which ye are promised;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: In heaven is your sustenance, and also that which you are promised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And in the heaven is Your provision and that which ye are promised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And in the sky is your provision and what you are promised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And in heaven is your Sustenance, as (also) that which ye are promised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And in the heaven is your provision, and that which you are promised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: In the sky is your provision and that which you are promised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And in the heaven is your livelihood, and what you are promised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And in the heaven is your provision and whatever you are promised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:22] And in the heaven is your provision, that is, the rain from which results the vegetation that is [your] provision, and [there is also] what you are promised, in the way of [the ultimate] return, reward and punishment, in other words, all of this is foreordained in the heaven.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And in the heaven is your providence) and from the heaven comes your provision, i.e. rain (and that which ye are promised) i.e. the Garden; your provision is upon the Lord of heaven just as what you are promised of reward and punishment is upon Allah;
